articles.description: Residents of Cushendall express pride that Argentina midfielder Alexis Mac Allister has family roots in the small county Antrim village ahead of Sunday's World Cup final.
articles.content:
Cushendall claims World Cup star Mac Allister
From the Glens of Antrim, the Mac Allisters have travelled far through the generations - and one of their number is now on the brink of World Cup glory.… [+3342 chars]
